description.en:
1. Sensei no Jijou (The Cause of my Teacher)  
Tooru, who is fond of glasses, confesses his tender feelings to his teacher. The teacher accepts him, but everytime they kiss the teacher takes his glasses off. Does he not want to see Tooru's face when they kiss?  
  
2. Shidoujitsu nite (In the Guidance Room)  
Souma Kazunari is a student that is regarded as strange by fellow students. He is in love with his male homeroom teacher Fukuzawa Hajime. Some students bully Souma by hiding a porn video in his desk, and it is found by the teacher. Fukuzawa calls Souma to the guidance room to give him a lecture…  
  
3. Torawarebito, Hitori (A Person Held Captive)  
Iijima and Ichikawa are childhood friends; Iijima has been in love with Ichikawa since they were small. He has chased after Ichikawa all his life, and has now entered the same company as him. After a drinking party where their supervisor has been hitting at Ichikawa, Iijima finally looses his cool and ties Ichikawa up…  
  
4. Wakage no Itari (Youthful Indiscretion) — Sequel to Shinobu Kokoro wa.  
The ninja Hiiraki refuses to follow his captain's orders to go on a mission separated from his lover Asagi and is thrown into jail. Will Hiiraki's and Asagi's relationship survive this?  
  
5. Wakasama, Gomen! (I'm Sorry, Young Master!)  
The son of a lord, who feels that Kurenai, his guard and martial arts teacher, took a sexual joke too far, challenges him to a match.  
  
6. Umi no Miya no Ko (Child of the Palace in the Sea)  
A scholar teacher of the Mountain palace country escorts back a spy boy of the Sea palace country (which dominates the Mountain palace country) who is bullied.  
  
Sensei no Jijou (The Cause of my Teacher) extra.
